title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle will 'be next to wed' according to royal's closest pals
text:

Radiating romance, Prince Harry and girlfriend Meghan Markle looked as they could have swapped places with the bride and groom at the altar in front of them at any minute. 
And the chemistry between them at the Prince’s best pal’s wedding was so strong friends kept sidling up to them, giggling: “You’ll be next.” 
The couple had jetted in to Jamaica to see Harry’s ‘wingman’ Tom Inskip tie the knot with literary agent Lara Hughes-Young. 
It was the first time the 32-year-old prince, who acted as an usher, had taken actress Meghan , 35, to such a social event surrounded by close friends. 
Afterwards, one wedding insider said: “While Harry and Meghan only had eyes for Tom and Lara, many of the guests were watching the royal couple in awe. Read More Meghan Markle wears floral dress by Kate Middleton favourite Erdem for Jamaican wedding date with Prince Harry The couple looked very much in love (Photo: MEGA) 
“Everyone could see they have a real chemistry between them, as if they’ve known each other a long time. 
“Throughout the day Meghan was putting her arm round Harry, holding his hand and often kissing him. 
"His inner circles of friends say they have never seen him so smitten and believe it is a question of sooner rather than later as to when Harry proposes. Friends believe the couple will soon marry (Photo: MEGA) 
“They were both teased by friends saying ‘you’ll be next’. There were even jokes about Meghan catching the bouquet.” 
Harry wore a navy blue suit, a light blue tie and sunglasses to the Caribbean wedding at the Hopewell Baptist Church in Montego Bay on Friday. 
Meghan, 35, chose a floor-length black and yellow printed dress, believed to be by Erdem, for the ceremony, which she matched with a nude clutch bag. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Take a tour of the STUNNING hotel Prince Harry and Meghan Markle will stay Share this video Watch Next 
During the service the congregation read the Lord’s prayer before watching the couple sign the register. The local choir then sang ‘Oh Happy Day’. 
On the wedding programme the Prince was listed as Harry Wales while the best man was Tom Faber. 
Other ushers included stockbroker Adam Bidwell, who once dated Welsh singer Katherine Jenkins as well as Princess Diana’s godson Jake Warren, and Archie Soames, great-grandson of Sir Winston Churchill. The couple attended the wedding of one of Prince Harry's closest friends (Photo: MEGA) 
After the ceremony the Prince and Meghan sat at a table by the beach with glasses of champagne as Harry smoked a cigarette and Meghan tenderly placed an arm around him. 
Our source added: “If this was a test, Meghan passed it with flying colours. She can hold her own with anyone and Harry loves that.” 
Earlier in the day Harry was stripped to lime green board shorts on the beach, while Californian-born Meghan wore a turquoise bikini. Prince Harry at the wedding (Photo: MEGA) 
They happily kissed and cuddled in front of friends as some took to the water to escape the 30°C heat. 
Harry was later seen on the balcony of their £1,600-a-night villa cuddling Meghan in full view of other guests. 
This morning he took to the beach without Meghan to spend time with his friends. 
Wearing blue swim shorts he took a dip, throwing a tennis ball with his pals, before heading back to be with his ­girlfriend. Prince Harry and Meghan hold hands at the wedding (Photo: MEGA) 
Later he was seen tightly ­holding hands with Meghan as couple headed off for lunch with other guests. 
The wedding party are all staying at the Round Hill Hotel and Villas, an 110-acre plantation style resort first built as a colony of cottages for the rich and ­famous of the 1950s. 
John F Kennedy and his wife ­Jacqueline spent their honeymoon at this haunt of other celebrities like Bob Hope, Paul Newman and Ralph Lauren. The happy wedding couple (Photo: MEGA) 
James Bond author Ian Fleming was also a frequent guest at the resort. 
The bride and groom are understood to have hired out the entire hotel. ­Jamaica holds bitter-sweet memories for American divorcee Meghan who married producer Trevor Engelson, on the island in 2011. 
They had been together seven years, but split just two years later. Prince Harry and Meghan at the wedding (Photo: MEGA) 
She began dating Harry last ­summer. The pair see each other whenever possible while he lives at Kensington Palace and she lives in Canada where her US drama Suits is filmed. 
Sources close to the couple said they saw the wedding as a ­perfect way to introduce Meghan to Harry’s wider circle of friends. 
The Prince vowed to be at his friend’s wedding after Tom, a friend from his Eton days, announced his ­engagement to Lara, 30, last year. 
Meghan had previously met the bride who is said to have spoken “in ­glowing terms” about the Prince’s choice. Royal couple Prince Harry and his girlfriend Meghan Markle spotted attending a friend's wedding near Miami, Florida (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
City banker Tom, 30, and Harry have been described as ­“inseparable” with the pair together on some of Harry’s infamous drunken nights – such as his trip to Croatia in August when they were snapped jumping into a pool fully-clothed. 
Tom was also with the Prince at a party in 2010 when Harry was seen inhaling recreational drug ‘hippy crack’ – or nitrous oxide. 
His father Owen is a field-master of Prince Charles’s favourite hunt, The Beaufort, and is also said to be a pal of David Cameron . Like us on Facebook
